name: Ivar's Translucent Firefox V1
description:
This is the same as 'Ivar's Translucent Firefox V2' except with total transparency on the newtab page.

V1 rel DEC/31/2011 - This is version 1 of "Ivar's Translucent Firefox - Clear Minimalism".  This is a conglomeration of my work and lots of UserStyles that I have enjoyed and still use.  I hacked my collection into one page, never thinking I'd be sharing. I cut & paste in lieu of installation from UserStyles and don't recall where credits are due but if you see something here that you authored, please contact me so I can remedy the situation.

Pinned tabs can be a problem if there are too many opened tabs (see "More Info"), which are 'invisible' on the left (if you hover over them, the popup will tell you what tab it is).
css: @namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);@-moz-document url("chrome://browser/content/browser.xul")tooltip { -moz-appearance: none !important; color:#000 !important; font-weight: 700 !important; background: rgba(255,255,255,.85) !important; border-radius: 0px !important; border: solid 1px rgba(255,255,255,250) !important; padding: 8px 12px !important; }#nav-bar, #urlbar { border: none !important; margin: 0px 0 !important; padding: 0px !important; border-radius: 0px !important; box-shadow: none !important; }#nav-bar { margin-top: 0px !important; }#searchbar > *, #search-box * { background: transparent !important; background: rgba(255,255,255,0) !important;border: none !important; border-radius: 0 !important; margin: 0 !important; padding-left: 4px !important; box-shadow: none !important; }#urlbar:hover, #urlbar[selected="true"], #urlbar[active="true"] { background: -moz-linear-gradient(left,rgba(255,255,255,.5),rgba(255,255,255,.15))!important; }#searchbar:hover > *, .findbar-textbox:hover { background:-moz-linear-gradient(left, rgba(255,255,255,.7), rgba(255,255,255,.3)) !important; }.urlbar-over-link-box {color: #fff !important }#urlbar { height:18px!important; font-weight:700!important; text-shadow:black 0px 1px 1px!important; color: rgb(255,255,255) !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(left,rgba(255,255,255,.05),rgba(255,255,255,.05))!important;}#PersonalToolbar { background: red !important; border: none !important;  margin: 0px !important; margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; }/* AppMenu Button */#main-window #appmenu-button-container { margin: 0 !important; height: 17px !important; padding: 0px 5px !important; height: 14px !important; }.toolbarbutton-1 > .toolbarbutton-menubutton-button:not([disabled="true"]):not(:active):hover, .toolbarbutton-1:not([open="true"]):not(:active):hover > .toolbarbutton-menubutton-dropmarker:not([disabled="true"]), .toolbarbutton-1:not([type="menu-button"]):not([disabled="true"]):not([checked="true"]):not([open="true"]):not(:active):hover{background-color: hsla(200,0%,80%,.5) !important; border-color: hsla(200,0%,65%,.1) hsla(200,0%,50%,.13) hsla(200,0%,40%,.23) !important; -moz-transition: background-color .4s ease-in, border-color .2s ease-in !important; }#alltabs-button, #alltabs-button:hover{background:transparent none!important;border-style:none!important;margin:0 2px!important;padding:0!important}/* identity-box */stack#page-proxy-stack, image#page-proxy-favicon, box.unknownIdentity#identity-box { background:none transparent!important; border-collapse:collapse!important }#identity-box:not(.verifiedIdentity):not(.verifiedDomain) { background:none!important; box-shadow:none!important; border-color:transparent!important }#identity-box { box-shadow: 0 1px 0 hsla(0, 0%, 0%, .05) inset !important; -moz-border-end: 1px solid hsla(0, 0%, 0%, .35) !important; padding: 2px !important; margin: 0px !important; -moz-margin-end: 0 !important; background: -moz-linear-gradient(hsla(0, 0%, 98%, .30), hsla(0, 0%, 92%, .10)) !important; border-radius: 0 !important; max-height: 24px !important; height: 24px !important; }#identity-box:hover { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsla(0, 0%, 95%, .35), hsla(0, 0%, 87%, .15)) !important; }#identity-box[open="true"], #identity-box:hover:active { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsl(0, 0%, 92%), hsl(0, 0%, 82%)) !important; box-shadow: 0 1px 1px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, .1) inset,  0 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, .25) inset !important; }#identity-box.verifiedIdentity,  #identity-box.verifiedDomain { text-shadow: 0 0 3px white !important; }#identity-box.verifiedDomain { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsla(215, 60%, 92%, 3), hsla(215, 58%, 88%, 0)) !important; box-shadow: 0 1px 0 hsla(215, 54%, 33%, .1) inset !important; -moz-border-end-color: hsla(215, 54%, 33%, .5) !important; color: hsl(255, 100%, 100%) !important; }#identity-box.verifiedDomain:hover { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsla(215, 85%, 85%, 3), hsla(215, 70%, 68%, 0)) !important; }#identity-box.verifiedDomain:hover:active, #identity-box.verifiedDomain[open="true"] { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsl(215, 80%, 80%), hsl(215, 67%, 65%)) !important; box-shadow: 0 1px 1px hsla(215, 54%, 33%, .1) inset,  0 1px 3px 1px hsla(215, 54%, 33%, .5) inset !important; }#identity-box.verifiedIdentity { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsl(91, 70%, 90%), hsl(93, 60%, 81%)) !important; box-shadow: 0 1px 0 hsla(92, 81%, 16%, .05) inset !important; -moz-border-end-color: hsla(92, 81%, 16%, .2) !important; color: hsl(92, 100%, 20%) !important; }#identity-box.verifiedIdentity:hover { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsl(92, 69%, 77%), hsl(92, 44%, 51%)) !important; }#identity-box.verifiedIdentity:hover:active, #identity-box.verifiedIdentity[open="true"] { background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(hsl(92, 65%, 70%), hsl(92, 40%, 48%)) !important; color:#000 !important} /* Sidebar listing order */#bookmarksPanel, #history-panel{-moz-box-direction: reverse}/* Sidebar BookmarksPanel searchbox + HistoryPanel View Button + adjustments */label[value='Search:'] { display: none !important }#search-box, #bookmarksPanel label[control="search-box"], #history-panel label[control="search-box"],#viewButton > hbox > hbox > label { display: none !important;
